title: Deprecate SortingMergePolicy
description: The SortingMergePolicy should be deprecated since first class support is now available (LUCENE-6766). The indexSort configuration can be accepted via the solrconfig's indexConfig section directly, and SMP can throw a deprecation warning through the 7x versions of Solr.

comments.content: WIP patch for this. Need to add tests and documentation changes.
comments.author: Ishan Chattopadhyaya
